At this point, the remaining costs, being a haul of Ostrum materials and a capacitor should be of no trouble for you.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests32.sub: The unfiltered power of the Elytra is within reach. Limitless flight.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests32.des: We've gated this rather far into the pack to limit methods of 'free flight', but now is the time. These rocket engine-powered wings can provide you will endless flight (with the accompanying Firework Rockets) as long as you aren't in space.
(...where you will promptly either melt spontaneously or suffocate)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests34.des: Sky Stone is then milled or crushed into dust, presenting an infinitely renewable source.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests35.des: 5 Moon Stone and 1 Certus Dust will compress into Sky Stone, usually only obtained in Ad Astra meteors.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests36.des: Three Glowstone and one Sky Stone Dust creates a simple way to renew Sulfur.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests37.des: Sulfur, placed in the Melter or Foundry, can be reduced to its fluid form, and while it isn't too combustible like this, it only requires some basic catalysts to change that...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests38.tit: Adding some dinosaur into that Liquid Sulfur.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests38.des: A large amount of the Carbon-based Coal Dust will create a thick, black substance, known to us as Oil.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests39.des: You will be presented with TWO choices when obtaining Oil.
1: &6Automating it&r, the attached process line involving Sky Stone, Sulfur and Coal will be integral in creating a renewable supply.

2: &6Prospecting! &rAnd by prospecting, I of course mean trudging through the Martian wastelands, in hopes of uncovering surface lakes of Oil. Whilst not a particularly sustainable method, it will for sure allow for your first distillations to obtain a quick headstart.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests40.sub: Another use for Biofuel, hope you didnt manually craft that back in Chapter 3...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests40.des: A steady supply of &6Biofuel&r, alongside your new stash of &bNitrogen&r can be assembled into an enriching compound.
Refining Agents are used as the catalyst in forming a far more combustive fuel type...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests41.des: The Distillery is your new best friend for exporting a new fluid type, capable of burning at extreme temperatures.
Using the compementary schematic obtained as a reward from the previous quest, you can place an outline of a structure to use as a baseline when building it.
A fluid (Oil), an item (a Refining Agent), energy and &6heat from Blaze Burners&r will allow the multiblock to operate.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests42.sub: Refine 'Hellfire' in a heated Distillation Tower.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests42.des: &6Lava&r is so outdated, &bHellfire&r is where the action is now.

From now on, many melting recipes are going to require a melting point &6too high for Lava&r to reach. Hellfire on the other hand will cut through and melt these materials like butter with its &b3000 Degrees Celsius&r burning temperature.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests43.des: You may have already got to work at automating scrapboxes!
In that case, you will be two steps ahead already... for this task, the easiest method of obtaining Saltpeter Dust is to heated mix or centrifuge it out of Rich Soil, which of course comes from this.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests44.des: Washing compost into Rich Soil is the quickest way to progress without relying on those dastardly random ticks.
Do not forget, if you still have a steady supply of pure biomatter going unused, it can be utilized in the more efficient compost recipe, no longer relying on bark or straw!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests45.sub: I'm going to be honest, who on Earth is Peter?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests45.des: Rich Soil can be placed into a Centrifuge to create large quantities of Saltpeter Dust.

Integral in basic Nitrogen automation, you could start producing it by placing Saltpeter into an &6Electrolyzer&r. If you hadn't made it when you produced the first Advanced Circuits, it's advised to create one now!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests46.des: We're on a path to reach &6Superheating Potential&r.
For utilization in a &6Distillery Multiblock&r, a Refining Agent will be required to produce a fluid necessary to accomplish this.
Nitrogen, alongside other goodies, can be assembled into a compound capable of seeping new power into Oil, when used in the Distillery.
Nitrogen can also be sourced from the frigid Permafrost rocks of &bGlacio.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests47.des: Cryo freezing is how we're going to convert &6Prismatic Shards&r into aurorite, a lost fluid from Glacio which can react with certain elements to lower their temperature by hundreds of degrees.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests48.des: Infuse the freezing heat dissipating fluid of Aurorite with Nitrogen to create a form of Liquid Nitrogen which will never heat when exposed to warmer atmospheres and high-tech machinery.
It's in violation direct violation of the laws of thermodynamics!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests49.des: Permafrost, which can be created by compressing Glacio Stone, will melt into a small amount of Nitrogen when heated with a Foundry Basin Lid.

If you've not used the Foundry Basin Lid before, it has a handy Ponder that will guide you on using it. It's simple! Just make sure to use a Blaze Burner and pump the output liquid using a Mechanical Pump.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests50.des: If you need a simple source of &3Hydrogen&r without getting caught up in Tech Reborn processes, try placing some Ice-related blocks into the Cryo Freezer!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests51.des: &bAurorite&r can be synthesized using the &6Prismatic Crystals&r you obtained from either vacuuming the Structured Prismatic Crystals, or crushed at low rates from Glacio Stone.
Reminder that the &6Stone Growth Chamber&r functions in every space dimension as a method to infinitely producing stone types from celestial bodies.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests52.des: Glacio Stone can be crushed, as like any other type of stone you've seen before.

This time, the results will not be of the metal variety, but instead be ice-related products. Prismatic crystals may also appear in your bounty, but beware the rates at which they drop is significantly lower than most other results.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests53.sub: Known primarily for its bountiful distribution of Lapis Lazuli, Glacio also contains multiple Overworld ores.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests53.des: Iron, Coal, Copper, &bIce Shards, &b Prismatic Crystals (Unique)
Ice stores at the planet's centre are almost infinite.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests54.sub: Permafrost is easily obtainable from the surface of Glacio, just find a large pocket of Powdered Snow.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests54.des: They are also automatable from Glacio Stone, at a rather steep price.
The primary purpose you can find with Permafrost is its rich mineral makeup of solid Nitrogen, which we can squeeze out for an easy source of the vital component in Liquid Nitrogen.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests55.des: A fun-sized snack favoured by the whole family. If you are familiar with Create already, this item needs no explanation.

However, for those that DO need an explanation, these can be fed to Blaze Burners to activate a second tier of heat, known as &bsuperheating&r. This will unlock recipes previously out of reach due to their heat requirements.
Blaze Cakes are not your only option, however. Pumping &bHellfire&r directly into a Burner with a Straw will superheat at a similar net fuel usage.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests56.sub: &bGlacio&r and the &dMoon Debris&r hosts a highly exotic form of Ice.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests56.des: They form in large spikes on the surface of the Glacio Wastes, but deep within the crust of the planet, ore pockets of them will form in packed ice towards y=0...
Use a &3Chromatic Vacuum&r to separate the crystalline pieces from the ice it is solidified in.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests57.des: Used in various &6Late Chapter4&r and &6Chapter 5&r recipes, these machine parts consist of Wiring, Steel and a &6Carbon Fibre Mesh&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests58.des: One of the first usages of a &bSuperheated Blaze Burner&r you'll encounter.
Remember, using a straw from &6Create: Crafts and Additions&r will allow you to pump &bHellfire&r directly into burners. Convenient, if a little more space-intensive.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests59.des: We'll be using Advanced Machine Frames a lot from now on in production of new machines.
It would be very handy to set up semi-automation for this.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests60.sub: Utilize a &3Centrifuge&r to extract cells from Saltpeter.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests60.des: If you have already been on a field trip to Glacio, you may also notice that Permafrost is a alternative, lucrative source of Nitrogen,
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests61.des: Glacio is a frigid celestial body in the &corbit of Mars&r with an overabundance of Ice and Snow.
Surely we can harness this landscape to discover methods of cooling our own creations.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests62.des: Items marked as &6[Fragile]&r are meticulously crafted devices which should never be taken off the production line by workers!
Attempting to hold these within the player inventory will cause them to &6Shatter&r into their base components, at a slight material loss.
Attempt to transfer these items straight from production to storage or to Mechanical Crafters using logistical tools, like Belts or Mechanical Arms.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests63.des: Are you still a Hephaestus tool user? I'd expect so, they are better in almost every way.
Some may find the simplicity of being able to use energy as durability relaxing, however, and their impressive mining speed is nothing to scoff at.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests64.des: As with your first rocket, the second will require you to bore a material and create a Screw Breech to use as a base item when forming &6Shimmer Amplifiers&r
The steps are the same, however this time you will be utilizing Liquid Ostrum, only obtainable from melting at 3000 Degrees!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests65.tit: Solid of frame you may be...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests65.des: Pour &6Blast-Resistant Cement&r over the Fire-Resistant Fragile Sheet Blocks you have produced, and give it time to set.
These casings will form the frame of the Ostrum Rocket, capable of thrusting you towards &6Mercury&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests66.sub: It's more likely than you think!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests66.des: Place down Fragile Sheet Blocks (Be careful not to step on them!) and &6throw your lingering potion&r over them.
This can be performed in bulk to save on crafting as many potions. Work smarter, not harder.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests67.sub: Produce blocks of Fragile Sheets, which you used in Chapter 3 to produce the Tier 2 Rocket!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests67.des: Upon placing them, you &6may not mine them by hand&r or step on them. Instead, utilizing alternative means, such as deployers with pickaxes, AE2 destruction planes, and other forms of block breaking automations will be mandatory.
The same rules apply to its fire-resistant bretheren, so don't waste your effort on a good block by mining it yourself!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests68.sub: Silicon can be obtained from mixing, centrifuging. or electrolysis.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests68.des: Through delicate processing of sand-related products, silicon can be made in &6bulk&r rather easily.
If you have been using AE2 up to this point, it is likely you have already made use of it, as a method of printing circuits out of your presses!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests73.des: Growing in the &6Moon Debris&r dimension, which can be accessed similarly to the Moon when clicking earth with a T2 rocket, lies a wonderful fruit.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests74.des: Sick of processing all your Biofuel for little result?
Fear no more! &6Pure Biomatter&r in the Distillery, with heated Burners, and Water in the tank will produce a much larger amount of Biofuel &6per item spent&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests75.tit: &6A portal from the Moon to Mars?&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests75.des: For the price of &610 Ancient Debris&r, a portal from the Moon to Mars can be created, and lit with an Astral Conduit.
A worthy investment, for those who are not interested in using a rocket for every trip. This should make exploring the planet more often viable!

&6WARNING:&r It is advised you be careful, as the portal will always send you back from Mars to the Moon, meaning if you built the portal in the Overworld you may not have a way back anymore! Make sure to always chain Moon portals -> Mars portals.
ftbquests.chapter.read_the_questbook.que: &6Vanilla Tools
Use the Hephaestus tools for early-game instead!
Regular Stone/Wooden tools can still be obtained through the fallback recipe by stonecutting Andesite Alloy.
These are still required in a few edge cases, such as the hardcoded loot tables for Drink Beer trading.
&6Project Tables!
And how to fix quests not registering

Tinker Crafting Stations are not recommended for crafting as they do NOT register quests when taking items from them. Please use &6Erdragh's "Project Tables"&r implementation instead as these have similar functions but do not cause this headache!
If a quest is not triggering, do not fret! Simply place the problematic items into a chest, and then re-take them, which should trigger the FTB Quests condition again.
&6Hidden Chapters
Your issues might be solved in later, hidden chapters!
By default, the only chapters displayed in the quest book are those which have been unlocked.
More chapters are unlocked when you complete the quests that are shaped like a gear at the end of every chapter.
&6Common Server Lag Causes
MSPT = MilliSeconds Per Tick. More MSPT, more server lag.
> &l&4Brass Funnels or Smart Chutes&r

Extracting items from a big inventory (like a big vault or a big chest) causes significant MSPT usage, funnels/chutes use more MSPT when filtered with a "List Filter" or "Attribute Filter" item, scales linearly to amount of filtered items.
> &l&4Bulk-processing dropped items&r
Instead, bulk process items on Depots or Belts.
> &l&4Contraption displacement-based Cobblestone generators&r
&7&oA type of generator where contraption locking into a spot breaks the Cobblestone, replacing it with a contraption (hence the term "displacing").&r
These are prone to spilling item entities everywhere, causes noticeable MSPT spikes when active and even more if the items are staying for a long time.
&6Villager FAQ
Massive inhumane trading halls are back, baby!

As of v2.1 villagers have now been reworked. Old progression skips are fixed and the Tech Reborn Electrician + Metallurgist &6(Generator + Iron Alloy Furnace workstations)&r now focus on Redstone + Create-focused items respectively.
Diamond gear is no longer obtainable from villagers, looks like they forgot how to forge it...
&6The Smeltery is disabled!
Alloying is done in a different way!
Hephaestus alloys are made in Create's &lMixing Basin&r.
Melting metals is done in the smaller &l&2Melter&r multiblock, unlocked in Chapter 2.
Your large-scale, later-game mineral melting solution is the &l&6Foundry&r, unlocked in Chapter 3.
&6Patterns?
Finally, we can use AE2 to its full potential
As of v2.1, AE2 patterns are now ENABLED and craftable.
The molecular assembler has been disabled as a result.
&6Item Transport
So many methods!
To begin with, you'll be using Create's &9Belts&r to move items short-range. This works pretty well and has relatively high throughput, but it won't last you the whole game.

Soon you'll unlock &6Trains&r! These are available in Chapter 1 and will suit your long-distance needs for most of the game. Trains can travel through portals and even unloaded chunks, however you need to have your stations and machines loaded in order for the Trains to pick up their cargo.
Later on, &3AE2&r will become available in Chapter 3. AE2 is an extensive and incredibly powerful mod, it's recommended you go to their wiki at &2https://appliedenergistics.org&r!
&6How do I input to storage units?
Crude Storage Unit my beloved
By default, Tech Reborn storage units don't allow automatic inputting nor outputting.
To allow your storage unit to accept items from automation, go into their inventory, and click the wrench tab on the left.
For inputs, select the &lIN&r slot and set the sides you want to be inputs to &9blue&r.
For output, select the &lOUT&r slot and set the sides you want to output to &6orange&r.
The &6Back Output Slot&r on the UI is the corner face, in the bottom right.
&6Brass Info
No filtering options?
In Create: Astral, progression follows a different order than that which you may be familiar with.
&6Brass is not obtainable pre-Moon&r, as Blazes, which are required to heat Basins to mix it, are only found inside "Lunar Power Plants", large structures found on the Moon.
&6You do not require a rocket to reach the Moon&r, instead you'll find yourself reaching it rather early... (End of Chapter 2)
&6Superheating FAQ
In Create: Astral, progression follows a different order than that which you may be familiar with.

Heating Blazes with regular fuel is going to be the primary heat level up &6until late Chapter 4&r. Blaze Cakes are a later component and will not be crafted through processes you'll be familiar with.
&6Where are my portals?
Say farewell to the Nether!
Attempting to construct a Nether Portal will leave you as disappointed as placing Water into a Glowstone portal frame...
&oAs far as we know,&r the Nether is long gone. It won't be possible to establish a connection.
&2(Portals can still be made, but they will be unresponsive upon entering.)
What's a Nether? (Completed upon joining the world)
&6Getting to the Moon without rockets?
Moon Portals!
Create: Astral delves into methods of reaching the Moon some would consider 'unconventional'.
The Moon is reached using a &lportal&r at the end of Chapter 2, and is realistically meant to be treated as an alternative to making the Nether Portal.
&4Computercraft / Turtle Chunk Saving!
Computercraft in 1.18.2 has a chunk saving issue!

Wait on the pause menu for &6around 10 seconds in singleplayer&r to allow chunks to fully autosave, before quitting a session. &2This bug is not present on dedicated servers&r, which do actual save sequences.
&l&3This only applies if you are near chunks containing computers!&r
&6Repairing my Space Suit!
Low on durability?
Each Space Suit tier uses vanilla Minecraft mechanics for repairing and enchanting. It is recommended you craft Mending books to repair these.
This naturally comes with less convenience than tinkers, however the repair ingredients are as follows:
&2Regular Space Suit&r = Sturdy Sheets OR Steel Ingots
&5Lead-Lined Space Suit&r = Netherite Ingots
&4Jet Suit&r = Calorite Ingots
Common FAQ!
We're building an FAQ ingame! Common questions which arise usually have explainable answers which may not be immediately obvious.
As the pack evolves, new knowledge must be shared.
As such, contributing to this page with questions *you* had when trying the pack is the most valuable content we can add.
PR's on Git are welcome with your own edits to this tab.
(File = read_the_questbook.snbt)
&6Early-game filtering
No Brass?
Drawers from &6Extended Drawers&r in conjunction with Chutes/Andesite Funnels from &6Create&r are good replacements for Brass logistics.
&6Locked Drawers&r are also a feature in Extended Drawers, preventing any other item from entering the locked drawer.
Toggle Combat Music
We heard your request!! Combat music has been turned down and a config option has been added.
.minecraft\\config\\astraladditions\\combatmusic.txt
Simply set the value in this file from 'true' to 'false'
Combat Music
The custom music you will hear throughout the pack is licensed so that you may use it &6wherever you wish&r!
Feel free to include it in &6YouTube videos&r or content surrounding Astral, it will not receive strikes.
Music was produced by Hesperyd, XETROO, PINS3Y, ethanicuss
Astral Music Info
&6Create Big Cannon changes&r
The progression of &6Big Cannons&r is slightly modified.
Whilst the majority of recipes are the same, the materials used in some have been adjusted to match the astral progression curve.
Wrought Iron uses &6Andesite Iron&r.
Liquid Bronze is locked behind &6Chapter 2&r.
Steel is obtained at the end of &6Chapter 3&r.
The final tier of barrel has been repurposed to &6Ostrum&r, obtained in &6Chapter 4&r.
10k Fluid Infinite Pools?
Gone!

10k Infinite Fluid Pools from Create have been disabled in favour of more traditional automation. All the usual fluids, like Lava, have multiple recipes using Create machinery. Check REI for these recipes.
How to FTBQuests
First time using a quest book?
Close this quest and hover your mouse to the left of the screen to open the chapter browser :)
ftbquests.chapter.the_trophy_room.title: ?) The Trophy Room
ftbquests.chapter.the_trophy_room.quests: The Players were ever-cunning, they used anything to do everything.
What is not recorded will be lost.
The Piglins were cunning enough to leave while they could - and small enough to fit through the portal.
Life isn't always about expanding and increasing profits. Sometimes a good meal is enough to be content.
The Sisters of The End fled their home when it became too uninhabitable. The End is inevitable.
As its flesh was torn apart, the Moon bled pink - The essence of everything.
The Industrial Revolution and its consequences
The Players pushed opposites together and untangled the entangled. Nothing out of reach.
How long ago were we there? How many ages past?
Stories of the &kNether&r were lost to time... lost to reality...
A friend; a memoir of all the good times.
